text: He muminasakala! Tomaloke ene kono bisaye prasna nakaraiba yito tomalokara ocarata prakasa karaa ha’le seya tomalokaka kasta diba. Arau kora'ana aratirna horaara samayata tomaloke yadi tenekuraa kono prasna karaa tente seya tomalokara ocarata prakasa karaa ha’ba. Allahe se'ibora ksama karaiche arau allaha ksamasila, sahanasila
